## useProfileSettingsInitializer() function

Create a callback for dynamically setting profile settings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useProfileSettingsInitializer(): (profile: string, value: any) => void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

(profile: string, value: any) =&gt; void
